snippet: Tom Wheeler has invested in start-up technology and communications companies, and advised the Federal Communications Commission on technology issues.
abstract: Tom Wheeler, Pres Obama's pick to be chairman of Federal Communications Commission, is  former top lobbyist for cellphone and cable industries; Wheeler faces challenges as FCC addresses dramatic changes to technology and industry in coming years.
lead_paragraph: Tom Wheeler has invested in start-up technology and communications companies, and advised the Federal Communications Commission on technology issues.

headline.seo: Tom Wheeler, Telecom Investor, Is F.C.C. Nominee
headline.main: Telecom Investor Named to Be F.C.C. Chairman
headline.print_headline: Telecom Investor Named To Be F.C.C. Chairman
